title: Backend Config Engine v0.4
summary: Flatten config management to file-backed packages (manifest + hooks + column modules), enforce a single active config per workspace, and expose a streamlined FastAPI surface with validation the jobs feature can consume.

nonGoals: Object storage or remote blobs (local filesystem only in v1).
Per-file collaborative editor (bundle/files endpoints are sufficient).
Automatic parallelisation of detector/transform execution in v1.
acceptanceCriteria: Configs live on disk under data/configs/<id> with manifest v0.4 plus hook and column modules matching detector/transform signatures.
Validation endpoint enforces structure, manifest schema, detector/transform signatures, and rejects plaintext secrets; diagnostics are returned for UI use.
Exactly one active config per workspace enforced; only inactive configs editable; archived configs immutable.
FastAPI endpoints cover create/clone/import/export, manifest/files editing, validation, activation, archive/unarchive, and secrets management; legacy /configurations routes removed.
Jobs feature consumes config packages to run detect→assign→transform in sandboxed subprocesses with manifest env + decrypted secrets injected, producing mapping + warnings for audit.
